citations.narrative:
Three enclosures have siding that is damaged right above the feeders due to dogs scratching the plastic material. The
damaged area is creating sharp edges which could be a potential hazard. The area above these feeders needs to be
addressed to keep the enclosures in good repair for the safety of the dogs.
Correct by: Jan 15, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.6(a)(1) 
   
Primary enclosures. 
Three enclosures have siding that is damaged right above the feeders due to dogs scratching the plastic material. The 
damaged area is creating sharp edges which could be a potential hazard. The area above these feeders needs to be 
addressed to keep the enclosures in good repair for the safety of the dogs.  
 
Correct by: Jan 15, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
